title: Zom 100: Zombie ni Naru made ni Shitai 100 no Koto Recap
content: "Zom 100: Zombie ni Naru made ni Shitai 100 no Koto Recap" is a special episode that covers the first seven episodes of the anime. It serves as a concise summary, particularly useful for viewers returning to the series after its hiatus due to budgeting issues at the studio. The recap offers a chance to refresh memories or for new viewers to quickly catch up with the story's key events. While specific details of the recap aren't provided, it's expected to cover the main character Akira Tendou's journey from his oppressive work life to his liberation and adventures in a zombie-apocalypse Tokyo, along with thestart of his quest to complete his 100-item bucket list.
